msg: Updated the documentation pointing out that the xxe tool have to be builded before using.

author: ekoneil
msg: Update to the Maven support document.  Having actually built a repository and tried this now, the concepts behind M2 are finally starting to sink in.  :)  Each of the JARs in the Beehive distribution will require its own set of files:

Also need to add support for source JARs.  I'll add the .pom / .xml files above into each sub-project in the tree and a "maven" step to the build that will produce the correct structure in the trunk/build/maven/m2/ directory.
